welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jurong, China! Get ready to experience the charm of this historic city known for its beautiful gardens, ancient temples, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Jurong has to offer.

terminals.description: This is the main terminal for domestic and international flights.
